definition: variant of 得意洋洋[de2 yi4 yang2 yang2]
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
idea/meaning/thought/to think/wish/desire/intention/to expect/to anticipate
abbr. for 揚州|扬州[Yang2 zhou1]/surname Yang
to raise/to hoist/the action of tossing or winnowing/scattering (in the wind)/to flutter/to propagate
variant of 揚|扬[yang2]
abbr. for 揚州|扬州[Yang2 zhou1]/surname Yang
to raise/to hoist/the action of tossing or winnowing/scattering (in the wind)/to flutter/to propagate
variant of 揚|扬[yang2]

sentences.english: It hasn't stopped the British Navy proceeding on its merry way.
sentences.chinese: 这没有阻止英国海军继续得意扬扬地前进的步伐。

sentences.english: He leaned back , exulting at the success of his plan.
sentences.chinese: 他向后一靠，为自己计划的成功而得意扬扬。

sentences.english: Robert was looking at me triumphantly.
sentences.chinese: 罗伯特正得意扬扬地看着我。

sentences.english: When she won the prize, Susan went home looking like the cat that swallowed the canary.
sentences.chinese: 苏珊获奖后，回到了家里，一副得意扬扬的样子。

sentences.english: He leaned back, exulting at the success of his plan.
sentences.chinese: 他向后一靠，为自己计划成功而得意扬扬。

sentences.english: His father's compliment left Jim walking on air.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆受到父亲的赞扬而得意扬扬。

sentences.english: Albert was triumphant in his harlequin costume.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔贝得意扬扬地穿着他那件小丑服装。

definition: immensely pleased with oneself (idiom)/proud/complacent
joyfully satisfied/to be immensely proud of oneself/proudly/an air of complacency
immensely pleased with oneself (idiom)/proud/complacent
arrogant appearance/smug appearance/to act condescending/to put on airs
to think highly of oneself
high and mighty (idiom); arrogant
fully content with one's achievements (idiom)/complacent
overjoyed (idiom); as pleased as punch
variant of 興高采烈|兴高采烈[xing4 gao1 cai3 lie4]
(coll.) contented/happy
happy and excited (idiom)/in high spirits/in great delight
beaming/radiant with happiness
proud of oneself/pleased with oneself/complacent
boldly/ostentatiously/poised/self-assured/Taiwan pr. [da4 mo2 da4 yang4]
smiles of exultation/radiant with delight
to speak forcefully and with justice (idiom); to argue with the courage of one's convictions/also written 振振有詞|振振有词
